name: Shimmer
description: Your yacht has been marooned in the Pacific Ocean following a violent storm. Gather the scarce resources you find to try and stay alive in the hopes of rescue. Explore, craft and hunt in this first person desert island simulator.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista or higher Processor: Intel Core i3 or higher Memory: 4 MB RAM Graphics: GTX 770 or higher Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: Intel Core i5 or higher Memory: 4 MB RAM Graphics: GTX 960 or higher Storage: 2 GB available space
